page.title: 17Events Our Jazz Band.
page.content: The Majestic Jazz Band,was formed in 1980. There are 38 members in the band. The colours of our uniforms are light blue, navy and white. The instruments of the band are{3 maces, {4 belaires, 1 tambourine, 1 cymbal, {25 gazzoos, 2 bass drums and 2 side {drums.}The fund raising committee work very hard raising money. They have jumble sales, sponsored walks, sell raffle and tote tickets. This year we have bought our own bus. We need transport because we travel to a number of carnivals and we enter many competitions. We train once a week for three hours. If we have a competition coming up we will then have two practices in the week. On the 25th May,1985, we were in the{World Jazz {Band elimination competition}at Aberavon. In our division we came third.
